bleep.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a short high sound made by a piece of electronic equipment
bleep.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to make a high electronic sound
bleep.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The timer on the cooker started to bleep.
bleep.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to let someone know, through their bleeper, that you want them to telephone you
bleep.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: to prevent an offensive word being heard on television or the radio by making a high electronic sound
bleep.translation[1].definitions[2].exam: All the swear words had been bleeped out.
